data: Banbridge lies near enough to the great City to perceive after nightfall, along the southern horizon, the amalgamated glow of its multitudinous eyes of electric fire.
Freeman, Mary Eleanor Wilkins, 1852-1930; Stevens, William Dodge, 1870-1942 [Illustrator]
